data.title: Office 365 Email on Mobile
meta_keywords: University of North Carolina at Pembroke
data.meta_site_name: The University of North Carolina at Pembroke
data.text:
UNCP faculty, staff, and students use the following links for instructions to configure Android and Apple phones and other mobile devices for Office 365 (commonly referred to as O365) email. Note that if you change your network password, it must also be changed in the email settings on your mobile device. In that case, go to Settings and key in your new password, or delete the account and create a new one.

Android Devices

Using the Android Email App

iOS Devices

Using the Apple Email App

Email can also be set up on the Outlook app which can be downloaded from the Google Play Store or the App Store.
